scripts.install: npm ci --prefix fauna-test-frontend && npm ci --prefix fauna-test-backend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix fauna-test-backend && npm run build --prefix fauna-test-frontend
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run copy-build && npm run zip && npm run cf-package
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation --profile personal deploy --region us-east-1 --template-file ./cloudformation-packaged.yml --stack-name fauna-test --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.package-deploy: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.redeploy: npm run cf-package && npm run deploy
